resources.title: Casa Lola
resources.description: A transitional housing program to provide a safer, affirming place to stabilize while working toward personal goals.

resources.title: Transgender Resource Center of New Mexico
resources.description: A non-profit organization that provides support, education, and advocacy for transgender, non-binary, and gender nonconforming communities

resources.title: UNM Truman Health Services
resources.description: A clinic that provides comprehensive, compassionate care to the LGBTQ+ community

resources.title: Safe2BU
resources.description: Safe2BU is a project of New Mexico Legal Aid that provides free legal assistance to LGBTQ+ individuals in New Mexico.
